title: league client won't open after hitting launch
body: league client won't open after hitting launch

replies.body: The link Zevrin is pretty old, and can end up causing you more issues than solving so I don't recommend using that.  Your specific issue sounds like a setting with your OS or program is blocking the client from launching.  Your best bet is to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configuring your settings to allow access.  That should get you fixed up!

I have had that problem before, I used the advice on this [page ](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1lps3z/if_client_is_not_starting_heres_the_fix_enjoy/)

I only had to do step 1
Hope this helps :D
